mapper.select:
WITH TB_PD AS ( SELECT T1.PD_CD , PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 = '4' ) , TB_CST01 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'01' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST02 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'02' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST03 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'03' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST04 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'04' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST05 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'05' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST06 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'06' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST07 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'07' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST08 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'08' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST09 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'09' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST10 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'10' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST11 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'11' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) , TB_CST12 AS ( SELECT T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 , COUNT(1) ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_SVPD_MCBY_CST_SV_OJ_IZ T1 , TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.MNGT_YM = #{baseYear}||'12' AND T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART'
AND T1.REQD_DT IS NULL AND T1.CAN_DT IS NULL AND T1.CPS_DT IS NULL GROUP BY T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 ) SELECT GRP_NM , NEW_QR_01 , SUM_QR_01 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_01 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_01 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_01 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_01) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_01 , NEW_QR_02 , SUM_QR_02 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_02 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_02 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_02 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_02) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_02 , NEW_QR_03 , SUM_QR_03 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_03 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_03 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_03 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_03) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_03 , NEW_QR_04 , SUM_QR_04 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_04 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_04 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_04 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_04) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_04 , NEW_QR_05 , SUM_QR_05 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_05 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_05 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_05 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_05) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_05 , NEW_QR_06 , SUM_QR_06 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_06 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_06 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_06 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_06) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_06 , NEW_QR_07 , SUM_QR_07 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_07 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_07 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_07 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_07) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_07 , NEW_QR_08 , SUM_QR_08 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_08 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_08 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_08 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_08) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_08 , NEW_QR_09 , SUM_QR_09 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_09 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_09 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_09 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_09) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_09 , NEW_QR_10 , SUM_QR_10 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_10 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_10 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_10 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_10) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_10 , NEW_QR_11 , SUM_QR_11 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_11 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_11 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_11 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_11) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_11 , NEW_QR_12 , SUM_QR_12 , WELLS_ACCOUNT_12 , (CASE WHEN WELLS_ACCOUNT_12 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((SUM_QR_12 / WELLS_ACCOUNT_12) * 100 , 2) END) ACCOUNT_RATE_12 FROM ( SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_GRP_CD', V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) GRP_NM , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'01%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_01 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0131' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0131') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0131') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_01 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST01 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_01 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'02%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_02 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0231' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0231') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0231') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_02 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST02 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_02 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'03%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_03 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0331' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0331') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0331') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_03 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST03 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_03 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'04%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_04 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0431' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0431') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0431') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_04 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST04 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_04 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'05%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_05 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0531' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0531') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0531') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_05 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST05 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_05 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'06%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_06 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0631' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0631') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0631') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_06 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST06 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_06 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'07%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_07 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0731' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0731') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0731') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_07 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST07 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_07 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'08%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_08 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0831' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0831') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0831') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_08 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST08 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_08 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'09%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_09 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'0931' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'0931') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'0931') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_09 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST09 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_09 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'10%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_10 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'1031' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'1031') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'1031') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_10 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST10 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_10 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'11%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_11 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'1131' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'1131') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'1131') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_11 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST11 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_11 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT LIKE #{baseYear}||'12%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) NEW_QR_12 , SUM(CASE WHEN V1.VST_FSH_DT <= #{baseYear}||'1231' AND (CST1.REQD_DT IS NULL OR CST1.REQD_DT > #{baseYear}||'1231') AND (CST1.CPS_DT IS NULL OR CST1.CPS_DT > #{baseYear}||'1231') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SUM_QR_12 , (SELECT ACCOUNT_CNT FROM TB_CST12 T1 WHERE T1.PD_PRP_VAL20 = V1.PD_PRP_VAL20) WELLS_ACCOUNT_12 FROM ( SELECT SV1.CNTR_NO , SV1.CNTR_SN , MIN(SV1.VST_FSH_DT) VST_FSH_DT , PD1.PD_PRP_VAL20 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ SV1 , TB_PD PD1 WHERE 1=1 AND SV1.PDCT_PD_CD = PD1.PD_CD AND SV1.ITG_QRS_BC_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY SV1.CNTR_NO, SV1.CNTR_SN, PD1.PD_PRP_VAL20 ORDER BY SV1.CNTR_NO, SV1.CNTR_SN ) V1 , TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ CST1 WHERE 1=1 AND V1.CNTR_NO = CST1.CNTR_NO AND V1.CNTR_SN = CST1.CNTR_SN GROUP BY V1.PD_PRP_VAL20 ORDER BY V1.PD_PRP_VAL20 )
